org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.controller
Class AeBpelProcessRootController

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.ui.controller.AeGraphController
      org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.controller.AeBpelControllerBase
          org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.controller.AeBpelProcessRootController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeGraphController
public class AeBpelProcessRootController
extends AeBpelControllerBase

Controller which is the root controller for the BPEL process. This controller also obtains a list of all Link models and adds them to its list of model children. The root controller is also used to boot strap the creation of MVC hierarchy in the graph container.
